title: Monetary Value
description: Reusable schema for representing a monetary amount in a specific currency
$comment: vNext: add support for multi-currency price ranges, inflation adjustment metadata, and exchange rate provenance.

amount.description: Decimal string representation of the amount, with up to 4 decimal places

minor_units.description: Amount in minor units (e.g., cents, pence) as integer; mutually exclusive with 'amount'
